courses.name: Programming Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to programming using C++. Covers basic programming concepts, control structures, functions, arrays, and file handling.

courses.name: Calculus and Analytical Geometry
courses.description: Fundamental concepts of calculus including limits, derivatives, and integrals.

courses.name: Applied Physics
courses.description: Basic physics concepts with applications in computer science.

courses.name: Object Oriented Programming
courses.description: Advanced programming concepts using object-oriented paradigm. Covers classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and design patterns.

courses.name: Discrete Structures
courses.description: Mathematical foundations for computer science including logic, sets, relations, and graph theory.
